name: WebGL2RenderingContext.isVertexArray
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.isVertexArray() method of the WebGL API returns true if the passed object is a valid WebGLVertexArrayObject object.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isVertexArray' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
